title: Vitals.com Physician Scraper
description: Extract comprehensive physician profiles and ratings from Vitals.com. Search by specialty, location, and insurance preferences.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Vitals.com search URL. If set, overrides specialty/location/insurance parameters.

specialty.title: Medical Specialty
specialty.description: Medical specialty or field (e.g., Cardiology, Dermatology, Psychiatry).

location.title: Geographic Location
location.description: State, city, or region to search (e.g., New York, California, Los Angeles).

insurance.title: Insurance Provider
insurance.description: Filter by accepted insurance (e.g., Aetna, Blue Cross, Cigna, Medicare).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Physician Profiles
collectDetails.description: Extract complete physician details including education, certifications, and full biography.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to process.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrent Requests
maxConcurrency.description: Number of parallel requests (1-10). Balance speed vs. reliability.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Apify Proxy for enhanced reliability. Residential proxy recommended for best results.
